characterDescription:
According to Lift, nobody remembered her mother.
With Wyndle's prodding, Lift recalls that her mother told her that she was from the Reshi Isles.
She remembers her mother's arms, her scent, her warm voice.
According to Lift, her mother always told her to travel ... and go places, while she's young.
Lift tells Mik that at least they both get to remember each their mothers when he expresses that he misses his own.
She thinks that it's good to remember that life is sometimes about mothers.
Lift remembers that her mother had been so warm, and kindly, so ready to take care of everyone. To her, it's incredible that anyone on Roshar should be as good to people as her mother had been.
Further, Lift believes her mother shouldn't have had to die. That she should have had someone half as wonderful as she was to take care of her as she wasted away.
